text: Statler and Waldorf are a pair of Muppet characters. They are two grumpy old men who fight and laugh at mean things on their balcony.A The Muppet Show episode guide, Season 1's episode 13, at Wikia.com's Muppet Wiki They both appeared in all The Muppet Show episodes except for one in which Statler did not appear because he was sick, so Waldorf appeared with his wife who looks like Statler in a dress.A The Muppet Show episode guide, Season 4's episode 13, at Wikia.com's Muppet Wiki Statler and Waldorf are named after two important hotels in New York (the Waldorf-Astoria and the Statler Hilton). They are mostly known for appearing as Marley and Marley in The Muppet Christmas Carol. Statler is an old man who wears a black suit. Waldorf has a mustache and wears a brown suit. Statler was originally performed by Richard Hunt and Adam Hunt. Waldorf was originally performed by Jim Henson and is now performed by Steve Whitmire and Matt Vogel. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Muppets Category:Fictional people de:Die Muppet Show#Statler und Waldorf
